title: Pardon of Binance’s Zhao is ‘rocket fuel’ for BNB token ecosystem, says treasury CEO
contentSnippet: The pardon could pave the way for Binance's return to the U.S., which would be bullish for the BNB token ecosystem, BNB Network CEO said.

title: Bitcoin's Offshoot, BCH, Edges Up 1% to Challenge Downtrend
contentSnippet: Minor gains accompanied by elevated volume suggest underlying accumulation despite muted price action.

title: 55 Years of Financial Surveillance
contentSnippet: Reform needs to happen before the Bank Secrecy Act gets to celebrate its next big milestone, argues Nicholas Anthony, a policy analyst at the Cato Institute.

title: Consensys-backed Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink deploys $200 million in ETH on Linea Layer 2
contentSnippet: SharpLink will deploy $200 million worth of its ETH treasury holdings into staking and restaking strategies using ether.fi and EigenCloud.

title: The Daily: Trump’s Truth Social gets into prediction markets, Circle launches Arc public testnet, MetaMask goes multichain, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Western Union plans stablecoin launch on Solana for early 2026
contentSnippet: CEO Devin McGranahan first signaled the company was exploring stablecoin integrations as early as July, inspired by the GENIUS Act.

title: Western Union to Launch USDPT Stablecoin on Solana
contentSnippet: Western Union will launch a dollar-backed stablecoin on Solana's network in 2026 to help customers with international payments.

title: Tether attests to full physical backing for its gold-based token as market value tops $2 billion
contentSnippet: Tether's XAUT value has more than doubled since August amid growing demand for tokenized real-world assets.

title: Wealth Managers Scramble to Add Crypto as UAE's Ultra-Rich Demand Digital Assets
contentSnippet: Swiss software firm Avaloq, which serves numerous private banks and wealth managers, surveyed trends in high net worth (HNW) investing in the UAE.

title: Heather 'Razzlekhan' Morgan's Release From Prison Wasn't Us, White House Says
contentSnippet: Despite her social-media suggestions that President Donald Trump let the rapper out earlier from her Bitfinex hack sentence, an official said that's not the case.

title: Indiana Police Recover Stolen Bitcoin Mining Rigs—And $75K Worth of Frozen Turkeys
contentSnippet: Police recovered $700,000 in Bitcoin mining rigs stolen from a company in Indiana... and $75,000 in frozen turkeys, too.

title: XLM Gains 2.3% to $0.3314 as Payment Networks Drive Institutional Interest
contentSnippet: XLM gains 2.3% in 24 hours, breaking above key resistance amid surging European session volume and growing institutional focus on blockchain-based payments.

title: BNB Drops After $1.65B Token Burn, Eyes Resistance Near $1,150
contentSnippet: Traders face a mixed outlook, with BNB's deflationary mechanics potentially leading to a boost if demand grows, but technicals show the price stuck in a narrow range.

title: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink: Crypto, Gold Are ‘Assets of Fear’ Amid Debt Concerns
contentSnippet: Fink linked surging crypto and gold demand to mounting government debt fears as the U.S. deficit is projected to hit 143% of GDP by 2030.

title: Hedera Jumps 25.7% Breaking Key Resistance as Spot ETF Launches
contentSnippet: HBAR jumped above $0.20 as Canary Capital's HBAR ETF began NYSE trading with institutional backing from BitGo.

title: ICP Hovers Around $3.20 Resistance With 115% Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Internet Computer gained 1.6% and rose to $3.22 as institutional volume spiked, confirming bullish breakout above the key $3.20 level.

title: BlackRock-Backed Securitize Eyes Nasdaq Listing at $1.25 Billion Valuation Via SPAC Deal
contentSnippet: The company could trade on the Nasdaq early next year.

title: Solana ETFs Could Draw Over $3B If Bitcoin, Ether ETF Trends Repeat
contentSnippet: Three spot ETFs tracking SOL, HBAR and LTC went live under ’33 Act structure on Tuesday.

title: Tokenization giant Securitize to go public via $1.25 billion SPAC deal
contentSnippet: The combined firm, to trade on Nasdaq under the ticker symbol SECZ, also plans to tokenize its own equity.

title: Bitcoin Miners Sit on Prime Power Assets as AI Pivot Accelerates: Canaccord
contentSnippet: The broker said bitcoin mining still drives nearly all sector revenue even as the narrative shifts toward AI.

title: ‘Runaway Bot’ Sends HYPE Token to $98 in One Minute on Lighter DEX
contentSnippet: A trading bot caused Hyperliquid’s token to more than double in a minute on Lighter DEX, raising concerns over thin liquidity.

title: Ethereum Treasury Firm SharpLink to Put $200M in ETH Into Linea DeFi Protocols
contentSnippet: SharpLink Gaming plans to deploy $200 million worth of its Ethereum holdings into DeFi protocols on the Linea network.

title: Hut 8’s AI expansion and ABTC stake form ‘hybrid story with room to run,’ implying 50% upside: Benchmark
contentSnippet: Hut 8’s power portfolio remains undervalued relative to traditional data peers, with analysts estimating $6M per MW in embedded asset value.

title: Trump Media to Join With Crypto.com in Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: The platform will be called Truth Predict, the President Trump-backed company announced.

title: TeraWulf expands AI push with $9.5 billion Google-backed Fluidstack joint venture as stock jumps 25%
contentSnippet: The deal lifts TeraWulf's contracted HPC capacity past 510 MW as it reports a preliminary 84% year-over-year revenue increase for Q3.

title: Morning Minute: Solana Staking ETF Goes Live Today
contentSnippet: The ETF floodgates are about to open, with three new cryptocurrencies set to have ETFs launched today: Litecoin, Hedera and Solana.

title: Coinbase Disrupts Bitcoin Backed Lending With Low Bar for Servicing Americans
contentSnippet: Coinbase’s Bitcoin-backed lending service relies on the permissionless nature of DeFi.

title: OceanPal closes $120 million offering to launch SovereignAI and digital asset treasury in collaboration with NEAR Foundation
contentSnippet: Kraken, Proximity, Fabric Ventures, and G20 Group participated in the transaction alongside the NEAR Foundation.

title: Trump-backed Truth Social jumps into prediction markets with Crypto.com
contentSnippet: Truth Social users will be able to trade prediction contracts using the new product technology called "Truth Predict."

title: Circle Opens Arc Testnet With BlackRock, Visa, AWS Among Its Participants
contentSnippet: Circle's Arc blockchain testnet goes live with BlackRock, Visa, and 100+ companies—aiming to be the internet's financial operating system.
